participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Confident and supportive, enjoys helping others.
participant_1.background: I'm five foot nine inches tall, but I don't care because I love my body. I was honored to be able to donate blood in honor of my late sister. My collection of raincoat-wearing toys is priceless. i play quarterback. I'm a singer, although my asthma limits my singing to solos.

participant_2.name: Avery
participant_2.personality: Optimistic and determined, loves to express creativity.
participant_2.background: I try to go for a walk every day, but it can be difficult because I can't see well. i like to play volleyball. I loved playing outside with my friends and riding my bike. i want to become an author. I enjoy listening to music with my brother and going to concerts.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking. How about you?
I'm doing well too. I just got back from a walk.
Oh, that sounds nice. I wish I could see better so I could go for more walks.
I'm sorry to hear that. Do you have any other hobbies you enjoy?
I love to play volleyball. I also enjoy listening to music with my brother and going to concerts.
That's great! I love to play volleyball too. I'm also a singer, although my asthma limits my singing to solos.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to be a singer, but I can't carry a tune.
You should give it a try! You might surprise yourself.
I might just do that. Thanks for the encouragement!
No problem! I'm always happy to help.
